title: 820 2533 - Backlight issue
message:
Hey ,

Liquid damage, Area U9701 and U7100.. This one  already works but backlight appear slowly and with DIM backlight like photo show.  

Already replace U9701, D9701, R9840, fix trace pin_24 _U9701 to pin1_C9796. 

LCD connector looks well and already did 3 PRAM. 

Any suggestion ? 

thanks

title: 820 2533 - Backlight issue
message:
"fix trace pin_24 _U9701 to pin1_C9796."
Are you sure?
I hope you didn't do that...

title: 820 2533 - Backlight issue
message: Sorry, my mistake. i mean pin_21_U9701 to pin1_C9796. was corroded.

title: 820 2533 - Backlight issue
message:
Post voltage at pin 2 of D9701.
C9797/99 are both OK?
Check all return resistors, R971x.

title: 820 2533 - Backlight issue
message:
pin 2 of D9701 = 28.90V 

Ya C9797/99 it's ok. no corrosion on there. 

i will check all resistors. but all seems ok. thanks
